remarks: Strong extensionality of addition (ordering version).  This is similar to ~ addext but for positive reals and based on less-than rather than apartness.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 17-Feb-2020.)
statement:
addextpr $p |- ( ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) /\ ( C e. P. /\ D e. P. ) ) -> ( ( A +P. B )
